entry.title: https://github.com/dgiot/dgiot
entry.content: Open source platform for iot , 6 min Quick Deployment,10M devices connection,Carrier level Stability;物联网开源平台,6分钟快速部署,千万级承载,电信级稳定性. Low code for Object model-Rule Engine-Data Channel-Configuration Page; Fully open source, Multi industrial protocols are compatible.物模型-规则引擎-数据通道-组态页面全流程零代码开发、全业务全链路模拟压测、前后端完全开源、多行业工业协议兼容。QQ群:346566935
